name: Dark Space(3D FPS)
description:
3D FPS Project - Dark Space

Changes -

- 2 Unique Levels, with dark atmosphere, new skybox, atmospheric fog for ambience

- Created a new script for automatic open and close door

Instructions -

W,S,A,D to move

Space to Jump

Left mouse button to shoot

Mouse wheel to switch weapons
